description.value: You are as light as a leaf whirling in the breeze. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Leap]{Leap} or succeed at a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.High Jump]{High Jump} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Long Jump]{Long Jump}, increase the distance you jump by 5 feet. When calculating the damage you take from falling, don't count any distance fallen while you are adjacent to a wall.
